'''Master of Weaponry''' is [[Tartaglia]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|character=Tartaglia|talent=Master of Weaponry|dead}}
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], this passive does not apply to other characters outside your own. So it is not possible to stack this beyond Level 11 [[Normal Attack]].
